chapter.para: Native packages are available for Fedora, RHEL, Debian and Ubuntu. A .tar.gz archive is also available and will work on most other platforms.
If you use a package for installation, you'll find upsilon.jar in /usr/share/upsilon/ on most systems.
You can run Upsilon Node like this: java -jar upsilon.jar
On Fedora and Ubuntu, systemd is used to run the service. Run service upsilon restart

chapter.title: Configuration
chapter.para: Upsilon uses a XML configuration file, which is normally stored in /etc/upsilon.
